ygData.subject: Re: Question about quest item again
ygData.msgSnippet: There are two NPC, one in Qeynos and one in Halas, that have quests relating to the gnoll fangs.  The one in Qeynos pays off a lot better, but the one in Halas
ygData.messageBody:
There are two NPC, one in Qeynos and one in Halas, that have quests relating to the gnoll fangs. The one in Qeynos pays off a lot better, but the one in Halas is good for barbarian factions. I would talk to a Captain Till in Qeynos and then find a bartender in one of the nearby pubs. For Halas, check the pit.

Munk

P.S.--Several of the web sites have more detail about these quests.

-----Original Message-----
From: scott@... [mailto:scott@...]
Sent: Wednesday, May 19, 1999 11:08 AM
To: EverQuest@onelist.com
Subject: [EverQuest] Question about quest item again


From: scott@...

I previously wrote that I had some sort of gnoll
fur quest item. I think I tricked myself (i'm not playing eq now and couldn't check).

I think I had a gnoll fang that I couldn't sell.
(Hopefully I'm remembering correctly)

Anyone know what to do with a gnoll fang?

Thanks
Azboklin the enchanter
